name: worklenz
tagline: A project and task management platform for teams
description: Worklenz is a self-hosted project and task management platform built for teams. It offers boards, timelines, time tracking, and reporting, helping teams collaborate and manage workloads in a single web-based workspace.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create tasks with descriptions, assignees, due dates, priorities, and custom fields

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Comment on tasks, mention team members, and share files within project context

features.title: Workload Management
features.description: View team capacity and task distribution to balance assignments effectively

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Generate reports on project progress, time spent, and team performance metrics

features.title: Custom Workflows
features.description: Define project-specific workflows and task statuses to match your processes
